caption.title: Image fusion results of GF-1 data based on three commonly used algorithms generated from ArcGIS 9.3 software developed by ESRI (Environmental Systems Research Institute) and ERDAS IMAGINE 9.1 software developed by Leica Geosystems Geospatial Imaging, LLC.
caption.p: ArcGIS 9.3 software was downloaded from http://arcmap.software.informer.com/9.3/. ERDAS IMAGINE 9.1 software was downloaded from http://erdas-imagine.software.informer.com/9.1/. The result shows that Principal Component Analysis (PCA) image fusion algorithm is the best choice for GF-1 data.
